Articles.Content:
When we add something in vab, it appears on staging list next to thing it was added to., for example radial decouplers added to tank will appear next to engine that is attached to this tank.

But this might be problematic for launch clamps added to higher stage or rocket - they sometimes appear in the middle of the list thanks to this mechanism.

And player have to manually move them to the bottomm - there is no reason to place launch clamps in other place than first or second position on staging list, isnt it? This shoudl be tweaked.
Default to bottom would be great, im not sure why you wouldnt want them there but on the rare chance you do then you would need to move them anyways so at least they are all in a single group.
